entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
